page.title: 03Employment in Dunmow
page.content: Approximately 34% of the working population in Dunmow are employed outside the district. Many of these commute by car to larger towns nearby like Chelmsford, Braintree, Harlow and Bishop's Stortford. Others travel by car or train to London. Out of Dunmow's total work force 24% have jobs in manufacturing industry with jobs ranging from managerial posts and directorships of firms to skilled and semi-skilled workers. 30% work in service industries; 22% in distribution and catering; 13% in the construction industry; and 6% in transport work. Only about 2% work on farms. This is surprising since Dunmow is a rural area but it can be explained by the great increase in farm mechanisation. Unemployment in Dunmow is low at 3% compared with the rest of the country.
